p: Model B predicted past pro-environmental behavior significantly, F(5, 168) = 7.46, p < 0.001, with R2 = 0.18 (adjusted R2 = 0.16), which is indicative of a medium effect size (Cohen, 2013). The only significant predictor was moral disengagement (negative). Except for beneficiary sensitivity, the effects were at least in the hypothesized direction, although they were not significant. As a result, Hypothesis 2b received only partial support.
